        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Cosa sai della UE?</string>
            <string language="en">What do you know about the EU?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was kennen Sie über das EU?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que connaissez-vous l'EU ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que você sabe sobre o EU?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι ξέρετε για την ΕΕ;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué usted sabe sobre el EU?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un quiz interattivo che testa la conoscenza della Unione Europea.</string>
            <string language="en">An interactive quiz testing knowledge of the European Union.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein prüfenwissen des interaktiven Quiz des europäischen 
Anschlußes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une connaissance de test de jeu interactif de l'union 
européenne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um conhecimento testando do quiz interativo da união 
européia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική εξεταστική γνώση διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων 
της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un conocimiento de prueba del concurso interactivo de la 
unión europea.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
